House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

official_title: To amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to establish minimum requirements for standards for the education and training of air carrier and airport security personnel, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to establish specified minimum standards for the education and training of air carrier and airport security personnel. Provides for the testing and retraining of such personnel.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to establish minimum requirements for standards for the education and training of air carrier and airport security personnel, and for other purposes.
